fructose::test_root::test_info Class Reference

 test_info (const std::string &test_name)

Public Attributes

std::string m_test_name
std::vector< std::string > m_arguments

Detailed Description

This structure represents data that applies per test. This is the test name and optional list of parameters passed to the test on the command line.
